title: Richmond National Battlefield Park: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar            Calendar        How to use the Search for Events feature To search for events and programs, click on the small calendar icons to choose your start and end dates, then click on "Show Results" for a listing of programs or type in a keyword and click on "Show Results" to view programs by topic.              Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 4 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Richmond National Battlefield Park Historic Shelton House Open      Time: 1:00 PM to 4:00 PM Location: Totopotomoy Creek Battlefield Fees: Free     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Every Sunday Weekly & Every Saturday Weekly  from 06/18/2016 to 10/29/2016 Visit the home of the Shelton family and learn about the battle that raged in their yard. View Details      Richmond National Battlefield Park Find Your Park Night at the Richmond Diamond      Location: The Diamond, 3001 North Blvd, Richmond, VA 23230 Fees: varies     Saturday, August 20, 2016 Join the national parks in Richmond and Virginia State Parks for a birthday celebration! View Details      Richmond National Battlefield Park Centennial Celebration      Location: Tredegar Visitor Center Fees: FREE     Thursday, August 25, 2016 Visit Tredegar and  join us for a birthday party for the National Park Service.  We turn 100 today! View Details      Richmond National Battlefield Park 100 For 100: History & Preservation of Richmond's National Parks        Location: Departs from Chimborazo Visitor center, 3215 E Broad St. Richmond, 23223 Fees: FREE     Saturday, August 27, 2016 Register for this Free bus tour of the Richmond battlefields, and see how far the park has come in 100 years! View Details
